review: I have been taking 300 mg weekly of fluconazole for 6 weeks now, and I'm at the end of my treatment. My fingernails are growing in healthy, about 2/3 complete. I would call this process sometimes difficult but ultimately a success.  My main side effects were a frequently upset stomach, and most bothersome - fatigue and drowsiness.  But I have pushed through the 6 weeks prescribed by my derm, and I see good results.
Had nail fungus of the finger nails on my left hand for roughly 8 years.  200 mg tabs, once a week cleared it in just over 3 months.
